docs.title: Welcome to Philipp's Journal
docs.text: This forms a collection from experiences and from observations made during open source activities.

• European Open Source Awards - Participants
  • EU Open Source Policy Summit - Panelist
  • Fosdem - Volunteer
  • Embedded World (Conference) - Speaker

• ELISA Workshop @Goodard Space flight center
  • Open Source Summit Japan
  • Zephyr Meetup Hamburg
  • Open Source Summit Europe
  • AGL All Member Meeting
  • ELISA Workshop Lund
  • Open Source Summit North America
  • Fosdem
  • EU Open Source Policy Summit
  • OSS Workshop EU

docs.title: Projects/Foundations involved
docs.text:
• ELISA
    • since 2019 community member
    • since 2023: Technical Steering Committee Chair
  • Zephyr
    • since 2023: promoter (support meetups, presentations, booth support)
  • Automotive Grade Linux
    • since 2024: OSPO EG
  • Eclipse SDV
    • since 2024: Safe Open Vehicle Core
    • since 2024: Automotive Processes SIG
  • Linux Foundation Europe
    • since 2023 Advisory Board
